definition: don't meddle in affairs that are not part of your position (Confucius)

definition: (negative prefix)/not/no
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
(negative prefix)/not/no
to plan/to seek/scheme
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
political/politics/government

definition: to hold a sinecure (idiom)
(idiom) what lowly people think counts for little

a wise man looks after his own hide (idiom)/to put one's own safety before matters of principle

definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
